Preliminary data summaries and final data analysis for a project looking at the efficacy of intra-muscular midazolam administered at capture for reducing stress and exertion in wild-caught spectacled eiders prior to surgery to implant satellite transmitters.

Citation:
Spriggs, M.C., D.J. Rizzolo, K.H. Martin, G.E. Myers, and M.G. Sexson. 2021. Effects of midazolam on corticosterone and blood gases in spectacled eiders prior to transmitter implanatation. Journal of Wildlife Management: doi 10.1002/jwmg.22046

Link:
https://wildlife.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1002/jwmg.22046

All R code written by Dan Rizzolo: daniel_rizzolo@fws.gov
